title: Pulse
desc: Pulse is a personal safety app designed to monitor your heart rate and detect signs of panic or fear. When it identifies a sudden increase in heart rate, the app automatically sends SOS alerts to your emergency contacts. Additionally, it allows those contacts to call you directly and provides real-time location tracking to ensure help can reach you quickly in emergencies.

title: PowerCals - Available on App Store
desc: PowerCals is a 1RM (One Rep Max) calculator used by weightlifters to calculate maximum weight they can lift in one rep. PowerCal help users to calculate and track their 1RM progress, we also providing a feature to track users personal record, and even generating progressive weight planner.

title: MeowBites
desc: MeowBites is a mindful eating app designed to motivate users to be mindful of what they eat, using characters to portray their daily nutrient intake progress. MeowBites developed through several iterations, with the goal of incorporating gamification to encourage mindful eating.

title: Moodsic Journal
desc: Moodsic Journal is a personal journaling app that enhances your experience with music. By recommending songs based on your mood, it helps you associate each day with a track, aiding in future reflection.

title: All Notes Matter
desc: All Notes Matter is an app that breaks down your favorite songs into their individual instruments, letting you explore each unique note. All Notes Matter is developed for beginner to intermediate musicians who enjoy listening to music in detail and want to learn the distinct sounds of each instrument in a song

title: noQ
desc: noQ is an app that provides a pickup system to make queue shorter and more efficient for you! Now you can get your needs more quickly and enjoy the experience in not queuing. noQ is made for you who have busy schedule and limited time to queueing.

title: dNotes
desc: dNotes is A note taking website to capture, manage, and access notes everywhere and anywhere. Developed using React JS, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Tailwind, Supabase, this website got a lot of features such as authentication, CRUD, and many more. With responsive and clean design, dNotes offer a great user experience.

title: RacersEdge
desc: RacersEdge is a concept website created for racing enthusiasts. This website is developed using React JS, HTML, CSS, Javascript, and Tailwind. RacersEdge offers a great user experience with responsive, sporty, and unique design. I'm responsible for developing the front end of this website.

title: VokasiBisa by Sakubi Teknologi Indonesia Landing Page
desc: A Landing page for VokasiBisa by Sakubi Teknologi Indonesia A modern and responsive website as landing page for internship registration.

title: Sakubi Teknologi Indonesia Landing Page
desc: A Modern, Simple, and Responsive website as landing page for Sakubi Teknologi Indonesia. Developed using Laravel, Bootstrap, Blade, HTML, CSS, and PHP.

title: Taxonia Adventure
desc: A 3D adventure game designed to engage students in learning about the Classification of Living Things, guiding them through the immersive world of Taxonia to explore and discover key concepts interactively.

title: NataEdu Translation and Interpreting Landing Page
desc: A Clean, Simple, and Responsive website as landing page for NataEdu Translation and Interpreting. Developed using NextJS, Tailwind CSS, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and Typescript.
